snippet.title: Play It! Chess Challenger - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Developed by Yuki Enterprise, this was a PAL exclusive game published under the Play It label from System 3 in 2004. It saw a re-release as part of the PlayStation 2 Classics line on the European PlayStation Store for the PlayStation 3 in 2012.

In the November 2003 issue of the Official UK PlayStation 2 Magazine, Play It! Chess Challenger got a score of 6/10, saying that "despite a lack of thrills and presentation, Chess Challenger manages to be cheap and rather cheerful to boot."

I am not sure if the game was originally a Japanese release beforehand, but looking up Yuki Enterprise on MobyGames, they are now known as EXAMU Inc., who recently worked on the Samurai Shodown NeoGeo Collection on modern systems. One of the games they made back then was Master Chess, which was originally part of the Simple 2000 series, but I can't seem to figure out if this is also the case that it's a previously Japan-only release or if it was made from the ground up for System 3 to release it in PAL regions.

Play It! Chess Challenger (C) System 3

#retrogames #retrogaming #ps2 #playstation2 #playstation2games #system3 #playit #chess #playitchesschallenger #chesschallenger
